Uses of Class
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.persistence.XTFDoc

Packages that use XTFDoc
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.persistence Implements a Java XTF client that takes a search phrase and returns a list of XTF documents. 
edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query Implements a Jackrabbit query handler using XTF and other query handling classes.
